name: Wyrdsmyth
description:
*if on mobile and clicking "run game" leads to blank page, refresh page and the game should load*

My partner and I have been on an unabashed wordle kick and this game was born out of our desire to play more wordle! Full credit to Josh Wardle.

I figured it would be fun if you could play wordle more often, and it would be especially fun to have a timed mode with a leaderboard.  As it's been several months since I have done any sort of game dev,  I used this as an opportunity to do a few day long personal jam to shake the dust off and reacquaint myself with Godot.  

Fonts:
Heavy Rain Font by Måns Grebäck
Revans Medium Font by Arterfak
Tools:
Godot
Audacity
Pixelator

music
